content: {"name": "New Way Of Life Ministries Inc", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Our desire is to remain open every week but there are a few weeks out of the year when we may shut down in preparation for a Saturday service event, holiday or another ministry function. We will usually post a sign on the door with a schedule update.\n", "email": "", "url": "https://www.7thdaypentecostalchurch.com/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3145 Kelly Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Scottdale", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30079", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.7877471, "longitude": -84.26092609999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(678) 656-6452", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
